verses.name: Leviticus 25:51
verses.text: If there be yet many years behind, according unto them he shall give again the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:52
verses.text: And if there remain but few years unto the year of jubile, then he shall count with him, and according unto his years shall he give him again the price of his redemption.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:53
verses.text: And as a yearly hired servant shall he be with him: and the other shall not rule with rigour over him in thy sight.
